pred: Pam lost her phone and wants to find it. She talks to a store clerk and finds out that her phone was on the counter. She talks to a store clerk and finds out that they can display something on the screen. She promises to post someone's phone number.
answers: Pam has probably left her phone when she was shopping. Dot suggests there is a way to get it back.

pred: Paula and Stew discuss the difficulty of a game with super hard levels. Paula suggests looking up cheats online.
answers: Paula cannot get past level 637 in her game. She will look up the cheats online.

pred: Carl is waiting for Meg, who is still looking for her lost key.
answers: Carl is waiting for Meg who's running late as she can't find her key.

pred: Mario asks Conor for a bucket of fries from KFC. Conor agrees to bring him something to eat, but he knows that Mario will pay for it himself.
answers: Mario wants Conor to bring him a bucket of fries from KFC as the latter one is out, and Mario will pay for it himself.

pred: Dan wants to wash his hands, but the pipe under the wash basin exploded. Steve suggests they write to the owner, but Dan suggests they do it themselves.
answers: Pipe under the wash basin exploded when Dan wanted to wash his hands. Andrea is going to write to the owner about it.

pred: Sally tells the group that Natalie is pregnant. Jane is a gossip girl and tells everyone about it. Sally tells them that Natalie is pregnant with Dave's baby.
answers: Natalie is pregnant with Dave. Jane didn't think Sally should share it with others as Natalie told them that in confidence. Henriette and Greg are surprised that the father is Dave not Mike.

pred: Ryan is visiting family in Manchester. He mentions that he has been staying with Ann, first time on his own. He likes it very much.
answers: Ryan is visiting family in Manchester for Christmas. Chris stayed home with Ann.

pred: Riley is watching a TV show where Chloe is on. Riley finds it interesting.
answers: Riley and James watch Chloe on tv undergoing a metamorphosis.

pred: Charlee is in class and is discussing a performance of a Polish play. She is devising it with a professor.
answers: Charlee is attending Portuguese theater as a subject at university. He and other students are preparing a play by Mrożek translated into Portuguese.

pred: Kate broke her arm and needs to go to the hospital. She needs to know if her medical insurance covers the costs. Greg suggests calling Linda or asking someone at the reception.
answers: Kate broke her arm and she's going to the hospital. She'd like to know whether her medical insurance covers hospital costs. Greg suggests her to call Linda or ask someone at the reception about it.

pred: Cathy left her sunglasses at Broke's place. She might come around at 10pm to pick them up.
answers: Cathy will pick up her glasses tonight at 10.

pred: Colin talks about the height of penguins and Ava.
answers: Colin informs Ava that with her height of 158 cm she is shorter than an average penguin.

pred: Ernest asks Mike if he parked his car on their street. Mike says he did not.
answers: Mike took his car into garage today. Ernest is relieved as someone had just crashed into a red Honda which looks like Mike's.

pred: Ania, Kasia, and Zuzia are discussing going to the church together. Ania suggests that they invite boys to go with them, but Zuzia disagrees.
answers: Ania, Kasia, Zuzia and Jan want to go to the church tomorrow. Ania and Zuzia do not find it appropriate to go to the church with a boy.

pred: Alice is sick with a flu and doesn't remember taking a vaccine. Clint thinks that the vaccine didn't work. Alice thinks she has consequences because she forgot to take the vaccine.
answers: Alice has a terrible flu. She's forgotten to vaccinate herself.

pred: Poppy and Harry both like Lisbon for its nightlife, but Poppy prefers to travel and sightsee.
answers: Poppy and Harry like Lisbon. Poppy doesn't like parties, but she likes traveling and sightseeing. Harry likes parties, traveling and sightseeing.

pred: Rob is at the grocery store and Ann is reminding him that they have food.
answers: Rob is doing shopping at the grocery store. Ann ordered him to buy a cucumber, some tomatoes, bananas and apples.

pred: Sally and Tim are discussing Imagine Dragons concert tickets. Sally bought the tickets and invited Tim to go with her.
answers: Imagine Dragons have a concert at ABC Theatre on 12 July. Sally wants to go with Tim. She bought tickets, they cost 70.

pred: Andre reads about a bear attack at a zoo. He expresses his concern for the animals and the need to keep them in cages. Megan disagrees with this sentiment and suggests that animals should be kept in cages to prevent such incidents.
answers: Andre is shocked after reading the news about a bear attack at the zoo. Megan is not surprised that an animal kept in a cage reacted that way.

pred: Susan and Jill had a roller skating date.
answers: Susan went on a date to the rollerskating disco and she enjoyed it. Jill doesn't find it exciting.

pred: Susan and Melissa talk about Susan's romantic weekend, including Toby proposing and the weather.
answers: Toby proposed to Susan during their romantic weekend in a cosy hotel near the beach.

pred: Joel and Becky are talking about Coco, a cat that Becky adopted from a shelter. They are happy with her behavior and she is not as naughty as they thought. They are planning to lock her out of the room if she wakes them up in the morning.
answers: Becky and Trent are taking care of Joel's cat Coco. Coco likes them both and is behaving rather well so far.

pred: Sue asks James to pick up the car after work tomorrow, and he agrees to pay.
answers: James will pick up the car after his work tomorrow. Sue already have sent him money.

pred: Leo and Charlie watch a prank video. Leo likes it, but Charlie doesn't.
answers: Leo, Charlie and Oliver are watching a video with a bizarre prank. Charlie has ambivalent feelings. Leo and Oliver enjoy the video's weirdness very much especially moments 3:24 and 5:24.

pred: Ben is online and mentions that he is off-line. He mentions that he is looking for a job and is considering pizza with coke as a potential activity. He also mentions that he will call Kim later.
answers: Ben is having a downtime, isn't very talkative. Kim wants to see Ben tonight but he has to rain check.

pred: Sonia and Toni are discussing staying in a hostel in San Sebastian. Toni suggests contacting the landlady, who rents a room in the apartment.
answers: Sonia is going to San Sebastian in a month. Toni enjoyed her the airbnb place there. Sonia isn't convinced about it and will let Toni know.

pred: Russ and Gurdun talk about their health and the team.
answers: Gurdun has the flu. He is feeling better. Gurdun hopes he'll be back at the uni on Wednesday. Russ and his team won the last match.

pred: Leah is a smart consumer who can get some money back by using a special code. She also wants to buy some items for Kristi.
answers: Kristi needs new trainers. Leah has a link for a discount coupon at an online store.

pred: Luke's train arrives at 3pm. He asks if anyone can pick him up. Jacob is at work until 5pm, but Fred can pick him up at 3:15. Luke agrees to wait.
answers: Freddy will pick Luke up at about 3:15 pm.

pred: Erin is a friend of Amber and she offers to help her find a new place to live.
answers: John and Annie are moving to London because he lost his job in Germany and found a better offer working in IT here. Annie isn't happy with the move. Amber, who was supposed to stay in their London flat for 5 years, has to move. Erin offers her place but Amber plans on staying with John and Annie.

pred: Gino is trying to decide between a white and a black shirt. Renee suggests he wear a white shirt and brown shoes. Gino decides to wear blue trousers instead.
answers: Gino wants Renee’s advice on what to wear. She gives some hints so that he doesn't look like a waiter and recommends wearing black pants, a white shirt and brown shoes.

pred: Henry and Mary are talking about Susie's baby. Mary has a photo of Susie and the baby.
answers: Mary is back. Mary's baby, Susie, is doing great.

pred: Tomas is worried about not receiving the grant yet. Sierra offers to lend him some money if he needs it.
answers: Tomas, Sierra and Jeremy have still not received the grant. Tomas is broke and is checking his bank account every hour. Sierra offers to lend him some money.

pred: Taylor invites Harry to a party at her house.
answers: Harry will go to Taylors party tomorrow at 8pm.

pred: Ethan talked to Evan about the function, and Evan will try to make Ethan come.
answers: Evan will try to make Ethan come.

pred: Boris is trying to be fair and flexible with Sarah's PTO request.
answers: On the following week, Sarah will get her time off from Monday to Wednesday.

pred: Sam and Carla are going to meet up at a cafe in Meanwood.
answers: Carla has a day off tomorrow. She will meet Sam in Meanwood in a cafe at 2 pm.

pred: Breann and Dianne are discussing the Pet Shop and the 10% coupon code. Breann wants cheetah print.
answers: Breann and Dianne are going to buy a cheetah print pet hut with a 10% coupon code.

pred: Jane is busy with a party and can't meet Ollie for lunch. She promises to bring tea and pastries.
answers: Jane is in Warsaw. Ollie and Jane has a party. Jane lost her calendar. They will get a lunch this week on Friday. Ollie accidentally called Jane and talked about whisky. Jane cancels lunch. They'll meet for a tea at 6 pm.

pred: Debbie asks Helen to bring her laptop to work.
answers: Helen has left her laptop at home and needs it for the presentation today. Debbie will bring it to Helen's work.

pred: Marta asks a technician for help with a PC. She mentions that she knows a good technician, but he is on vacation. She asks Pablo, who is on vacation, if he knows a good technician.
answers: Marta needs help with the PC. On Joel's advice, she will contact Cynthia or Elena as they might know someone.
